raw_comment:
I immediately notice the disparity between players and coach percentages. The darker pink bars represent the players of color, and the lighter pink bars represent the head coaches of color. I also notice that in the graph they included the women's basketball association and the national basketball association. With these two graphs compared right next to each other, I notice that the women's basketball association has 5% fewer head coaches of color than the national basketball association. I  wonder why that is? I wonder why the national football league has the fewest amount of head coaches of color? I also wonder why the head coaches of the color statistic are less than 50% for all of the sports? This impacts my community as it provides knowledge and statistics to help inform people of the different percentages of diversity in different sports in regards to players and head coaches.

Title: "Diversity of different sports with players and coaches"
ace_sentences: I notice a disparity between the percentages of players and the percentages of head coaches.
The darker pink bars represent players of color.
The lighter pink bars represent head coaches of color.
The graph includes the Women's Basketball Association.
The graph includes the National Basketball Association.
The two graphs are next to each other.
The Women's Basketball Association has 5% fewer head coaches of color than the National Basketball Association.
I wonder why the Women's Basketball Association has fewer head coaches of color than the National Basketball Association.
The National Football League has the fewest head coaches of color.
I wonder why the National Football League has the fewest head coaches of color.
In all sports, the percentage of head coaches of color is less than 50%.
I wonder why the percentage of head coaches of color is less than 50% in all sports.
This information provides knowledge about diversity percentages in different sports.
This information provides statistics about the percentages of players of color and head coaches of color in different sports.
The title is: Diversity of different sports with players and coaches.
